entry.data:
SHOWERS LIKELY WITH A SLIGHT CHANCE OF THUNDERSTORMS LATE THIS EVENING, THEN SHOWERS WITH A CHANCE OF THUNDERSTORMS AFTER MIDNIGHT
LOWS IN THE MID 60S
SOUTHEAST WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH
CHANCE OF RAIN NEAR 100 PERCENT

A CHANCE OF THUNDERSTORMS
SHOWERS
HIGHS IN THE MID 70S
SOUTHEAST WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH
CHANCE OF RAIN 90 PERCENT

MOSTLY CLOUDY
A CHANCE OF SHOWERS AND THUNDERSTORMS IN THE EVENING
LOWS IN THE LOWER 60S
SOUTH WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH, BECOMING WEST AFTER MIDNIGHT
CHANCE OF RAIN 50 PERCENT

MOSTLY SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE MID 80S
SOUTHWEST WINDS AROUND 5 MPH

PARTLY CLOUDY
LOWS IN THE MID 60S
SOUTH WINDS AROUND 5 MPH

PARTLY SUNNY WITH A CHANCE OF THUNDERSTORMS
A CHANCE OF SHOWERS IN THE MORNING, THEN SHOWERS LIKELY IN THE AFTERNOON
HIGHS IN THE MID 80S
CHANCE OF RAIN 60 PERCENT

MOSTLY CLOUDY WITH A CHANCE OF SHOWERS AND THUNDERSTORMS
LOWS IN THE UPPER 60S
CHANCE OF RAIN 50 PERCENT

PARTLY SUNNY WITH A CHANCE OF THUNDERSTORMS
A CHANCE OF SHOWERS IN THE MORNING, THEN SHOWERS LIKELY IN THE AFTERNOON
HIGHS IN THE MID 80S

MOSTLY CLOUDY
A CHANCE OF SHOWERS AND THUNDERSTORMS
LOWS IN THE UPPER 60S
HIGHS IN THE UPPER 80S

PARTLY CLOUDY WITH A CHANCE OF SHOWERS AND THUNDERSTORMS IN THE EVENING, THEN MOSTLY CLEAR AFTER MIDNIGHT

MOSTLY CLEAR
HIGHS IN THE MID 80S
LOWS IN THE LOWER 60S

MOSTLY SUNNY
